product_name: Craft Active Bike Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: When there's a light nip in the air and you want a little wind protection as you head out, the lightweight, water-resistant Karhu Active Bike rain jacket for men is just right. Repels wind and light drizzle to keep you riding longer; front placket blocks drafts. Mesh panels at sweat zones keep you ventilated. Preshaped arms optimize the fit. Easily stows in your jersey pocket after you warm up. Karhu Active Bike rain jacket for men features 3 back pockets, reflective trim and elastic gripper hem.
short_description: When there's a light nip in the air and you want a little wind protection as you head out, the lightweight, water-resistant Karhu Active Bike rain jacket for men is just right.
